name: Text Prettier
description:
This plugin improve your typography and helps you make your texts legible, readable and appealing when displayed.

How to use TextPrettier:
— Select one or more text layers in your artboard
— Run the plugin from Plugins → TextPrettier or click on your own hotkey
— Now your text is awesome

What plugin can fix in your text:
• non-breaking space ( ) if necessary
• dash and em dash (—) ( — ) correct usage
• correct quotes
• hanging punctuation (or pretexts)
• trailing commas, blanks
• delete double punctuation and repeat space
• apostrophe
• symbols 
• numbers with many digits format (digits may be divided into groups of three)
• date format
• currency format (for roubles / rur)
• phone number format
• math signs, fractions, pow
• Et cetera
